parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF 11240014) at the bottom. This strongly suggests electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are mandated for campaign materials.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions and promotes Sorin Cristian Alic, a candidate for senator with the AUR party.  The image clearly shows him and other AUR members. This directly fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, this content is clearly intended to reach a wide audience, not just a select few.  The use of Facebook as a platform further supports this.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to vote for Sorin Cristian Alic and the AUR party. The text "VOTEAZA AUR!" ("Vote AUR!") leaves no doubt about its intention to influence the election outcome. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. It lacks any objective reporting or analysis. Instead, it directly advocates for a specific candidate and party.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clear and direct call to action for electoral support.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>615181904175327</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Sorin Cristian Alic), uses visual and textual elements to promote him and his party (AUR), targets a wide audience via a paid Facebook advertisement, and has a clear electoral objective (influencing votes). The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  There are no counterarguments to suggest otherwise.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Sorin Cristian Alic</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>AUR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
RLX Vision Digital SRL, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 615181904175327) cu conținut electoral, care promovează explicit candidatul Sorin Cristian Alic și Partidul AUR, folosind imagini și text ("VOTEAZA AUR!") cu scopul clar de a influența votul alegătorilor. Postarea îndeplinește toate criteriile materialului de propagandă electorală conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, inclusiv prezența numărului CMF 11240014. Efectul electoral este evident, având în vedere mesajul direct și vizibil de îndemn la vot pentru candidatul AUR.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
